dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Count Per Area (Target)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Seed rate, plant rate, etc. per area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Count Per Area (Actual)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Seed rate, plant rate, etc. per area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Count Per Area (Control)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Seed rate, plant rate, etc. per area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Mass Per Area (Actual)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Granular and bulk seed applications expressed per area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Mass Per Area (Target)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Granular and bulk seed applications expressed per area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Mass Per Area (Control)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Granular and bulk seed applications expressed per area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Total Count
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Total Count of Application.  E.g., total seeds.

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Dry Mass Per Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Harvest mass per area adjusted to a standard moisture percentage

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Total Dry Mass
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Total harvest mass adjusted to a standard moisture percentage

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Bale Count Per Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Count of harvested bales per area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Dry Volume Per Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Harvest volume per area.  For crops sold at a standard moisture percentage, defined in that percentage(dry value).

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Total Dry Volume
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Total harvest volume, adjusted to a standard moisture percentage

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Count Per Time
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Seed rate, plant rate, etc. per time

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Mass Per Time
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Granular and bulk seed applications expressed per time

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Dry Mass Per Time
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Harvest mass per time adjusted to a standard moisture percentage

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Bale Count Per Time
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Count of harvested bales per time

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Yield Dry Volume Per Time
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Harvest volume per time. For crops sold at a standard moisture percentage, defined in that percentage(dry value).

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Distance Traveled
dataTypeRepresentations.description: The distance traveled by the device

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Downforce Margin
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Force acting on a planter row unit factoring its weight, additional downforce applied and the upward force of the soil.

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Row Cleaner Pressure (Actual)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Row Cleaner pressure on a planter

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Row Cleaner Pressure (Target)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Row Cleaner pressure on a planter

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Row Cleaner Pressure (Control)
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Row Cleaner pressure on a planter

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Soil Organic Matter
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Amount of organic matter in soil

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Soil Cation Exchange Capacity
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Reported Cation Exchange Capacity of Soil

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Furrow Residue
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Amount of residue/trash in a plating furrow

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Billable Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: The area used to bill for a service conducted on a field

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Applied Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Area recorded by a field computer that is the as-applied area including some overlap due to machine limitations and is an attribute of a work record that is operation specific and not an attribute of the boundary

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Reported Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: The area included for reporting purposes such as insurance, green house gas, or governmental

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Calculated Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Area calculated using a boundary or perimeter of area covered in a field operation also called GIS area

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Arable Area
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Total area of a field that is cultivated, excluding areas such as waterways

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Wind Direction
dataTypeRepresentations.description: The measured wind direction from North

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Relative Humidity
dataTypeRepresentations.description: The measured relative humidity of the air

dataTypeRepresentations.name: IdSourceType
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Defined type of an Id Source

dataTypeRepresentations.name: DateContext
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Nature of the date and/or time reported

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Role
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Defines the role a Party is performing in the given situation

items.name: Other
items.description: A type of Reference Layer not otherwise included in this list

items.name: Imagery
items.description: Specific imagery to be used by the data consumer

items.name: Administrative Boundaries
items.description: Comprehensive field boundaries as defined by a governmental or other external entity

items.name: Elevation
items.description: Predefined elevation contours to be used by the data consumer

items.name: Management Zone
items.description: Features used or to be used in preparing agronomic recommendations.

items.name: Profit
items.description: Pre-calculated farm profit data to be used by the data consumer

items.name: Soil Type
items.description: Features grouping ground sharing common soil taxonomic classification

items.name: Variety Locator
items.description: Features grouping planted varieties for use in spatial identification during harvest

items.name: Obstacles
items.description: General obstacles outside of the context of specific fields. For field-specific obstacles, use FieldBoundary.Obstacles.

items.name: Seed
items.description: Undeveloped plant embryos

items.name: Plant
items.description: Any stage of a plants other than seed used to initiate cultivation

items.name: Fertilizer Chemical
items.description: A synthetic crop nutrition product

items.name: Fertilizer Organic
items.description: An organic crop nutrition product

items.name: Herbicide
items.description: A weed control product

items.name: Insecticide
items.description: An insect control product

items.name: Fungicide
items.description: A fungus control product

items.name: Rodenticide
items.description: A rodent control product

items.name: Nematicide
items.description: A nematode control product

items.name: Spray Adjuvant
items.description: Any substance added to a liquid spray product to enhance its performance

items.name: Nitrogen Stabilizer
items.description: A product to limit soil nitrogen loss

items.name: Growth Regulator
items.description: Non-nutrient chemicals that modify plant growth

items.name: Feed
items.description: An animal nutrition product

items.name: Water
items.description: Used for plant irrigation, animal hydration or as a spray carrier

items.name: Harvested Product
items.description: The product harvested from the Crop on a Field

items.name: Defoliant
items.description: A product used to remove the leaves on a cultivated crop before harvest.  When used to control weeds, use Herbicide above.

items.name: Mix
items.description: Multiple products combined together to be applied simultaneously.   Configure Product.ProductComponents to define mix contents.

dataTypeRepresentations.name: ProductStatus
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Whether a Product is in active usage

dataTypeRepresentations.name: ProductForm
dataTypeRepresentations.description: The physical form of a Product

dataTypeRepresentations.name: DocumentRelationshipType
dataTypeRepresentations.description: How one Adapt Document relates to another.

items.name: Causal
items.description: Data in the originating document caused this document to be created.

items.name: Contextual
items.description: The originating document is used to inform this document.

items.name: Compositional
items.description: This document is partially composed by the originating document.

dataTypeRepresentations.name: GuidancePatternExtension
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Specifies how a Guidance Pattern should be extended

dataTypeRepresentations.name: GuidancePatternPropagationDirection
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Specifies the direction(s) a Guidance Pattern should be propagated

dataTypeRepresentations.name: DataDefinitionBaseType
dataTypeRepresentations.description: The root type of a Data Type Definition

dataTypeRepresentations.name: NumericDataType
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Specifies how a numeric value is to be encoded in accompanying binary data

items.name: Integer
items.description: A whole number, potentially negative

items.name: Double
items.description: An IEEE 753 Double precision floating point value

dataTypeRepresentations.name: Scope
dataTypeRepresentations.description: Adapt component to which a Data Type Definition is relevant

items.name: Application General
items.description: Applying input(s) to a Field for purposes not otherwise specified in this list.

items.name: Application Fertilizing
items.description: Applying crop nutrition input(s) to a Field.

items.name: Application Sowing And Planting
items.description: Introducing the seeds or other plant material into a field.

items.name: Application Crop Protection
items.description: Applying crop protection input(s) to a Field.

items.name: Application Irrigation
items.description: Applying water to a Field for the purpose of irrigation.

items.name: Harvest General
items.description: Harvesting a Field through means not otherwise specified in this list, including combining

items.name: Harvest Forage Chopping
items.description: Harvesting a Field with a forage chopper

items.name: Harvest Baling
items.description: Harvesting a crop into bales

items.name: Harvest Mowing And Swathing
items.description: Cutting the crop to be dried in the Field before a subsequent harvest operation.

items.name: Harvest Wrapping
items.description: The activity of wrapping the harvested crop in protective material

items.name: Tillage
items.description: Mechanical preparation of soil for cultivation

items.name: Observation General
items.description: A Field Observation activity such as scouting or soil testing

items.name: Vehicle Data Collection General
items.description: The activity of collecting data from the tractor or other vehicle, often alongside another Operation Type or in transport between Fields.
